myfuel.DBHandler

Class FuelOrderDBHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • myfuel.DBHandler.DBHandler
      • myfuel.DBHandler.FuelOrderDBHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class FuelOrderDBHandler
extends DBHandler
    Car Fuel Database Handler, responsible for all the related Car fuel queries.
    Author:
    Maor

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,

        This method notified by the server when a new client request received, Sets the server response to booleanResponse or CarFuelResponse , according to the client request and SQL Errors.
